name: Trickery Domain
description: Clerics of the Trickery Domain use misdirection, illusion, and stealth to undermine enemies and empower allies through cunning divine magic.

1.name: Trickery Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Blessing of the Trickster
1.description: You can grant another creature advantage on Stealth checks for a time.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Invoke Duplicity
2.description: You create an illusory duplicate of yourself that helps you cast spells and confuse enemies.

6.name: Cloak of Shadows
6.description: You can become invisible for a short duration.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra poison damage.

17.name: Improved Duplicity
17.description: You can create more than one duplicate with Invoke Duplicity.
